name: is This Out Of Place?
description:
is This Out Of Place? is a game about everything being out of place.From the texture,sounds to the gameplay and story.

-The Linux Build may not work!

-Story(I didn't have time to make one in the game):

You are Gigel.Gigel loves cola but he dont have one at the moment.So you are going to the Out Of Place SuperMarket.Here everything is out of place(don't know why) .Soo You want to  buy a Cola BUT from nowhere Robots appeared  and the peoples run because they are scared and apparently you have a shootgun(Dont know why) so you fight them.

-GOAL:

Play and Have Fun!(You have a Highscore soo... and replayability) 

SORRY FOR BUGS!!!!(if there is any)

I recommend you to have a gtx750ti,gt1030 or rx550 or similar to play this game
